entries: The Guild Wars franchise is the flagship franchise of the Washington state based development studio ArenaNet.
The eighth entry into it's now 20 year old story is Guild Wars 2 Heart of Thorns.
This book aims to capture the story and the feelings of this beloved game, and bring them to the gaming table with the help of the Dungeons & Dragons 5 edition rule set.
All credit goes to the amazing people at ArenaNet and NCSoft, who have given us players such magical adventures.

optionalfeature.name: Staff Strike
entries: {@b Casting Time:} Bonus Action or Action
{@b Description:} Chain. Strike your enemies with your staff.

optionalfeature.name: Staff Bash

prerequisite.other: Thief wielding a Staff. Must follow Staff Strike.

entries: {@b Casting Time:} Bonus Action or Action
{@b Description:} Chain. Swing your staff a second time, striking multiple enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Punishing Strikes

prerequisite.other: Thief wielding a Staff. Must follow Staff Bash.

entries: {@b Description:} Chain. Whirl your staff around, striking nearby enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Hook Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Stealth Attack. Attack your foes with stealth, knocking enemies down.

optionalfeature.name: Weakening Whirl
entries: {@b Casting Time:} Bonus Action or Action
{@b Description:} Deliver multiple strikes, weakening foes.

optionalfeature.name: Debilitating Arc
entries: {@b Properties:} Leap Away, Breaks Immobilize, Sequence
{@b Description:} Strike enemies in front of you and roll backward, breaking immobilizing effects. Gain access to Helmet Breaker.

optionalfeature.name: Helmet Breaker

prerequisite.other: Thief wielding a Staff. Must follow Debilitating Arc.

entries: {@b Casting Time:} Bonus Action or Action
{@b Description:} Leap at your target with an overhead strike that dazes them.

optionalfeature.name: Dust Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Spin your staff in the air, creating a vortex of dust around you that blinds enemies and reflects projectiles.

optionalfeature.name: Vault
entries: {@b Description:} Leap toward your destination, damaging foes upon impact.

optionalfeature.name: Primal Rage

prerequisite.other: Access to the Berserker Elite Specialization.

entries: While in Berserk mode, you gain access to Primal Burst skills based on your equipped main-hand weapon as shown in the {@table Warrior Primal Burst Skills|GW2HoT} table. You lose access to your regular Burst skills while in Berserk mode.

optionalfeature.name: Smash Brawler
entries: When you hit with a Primal Burst skill, extend the duration of your berserk. Critical-hit chance is increased while berserk.

optionalfeature.name: Last Blaze
entries: When you use a rage skill, inflict burning on nearby enemies. Rage skills extend berserk longer.

optionalfeature.name: Savage Instinct
entries: Activating berserk mode breaks stuns and reduces incoming damage.

optionalfeature.name: Burst of Aggression

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Smash Brawler|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Last Blaze|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Savage Instinct|GW2HoT}

entries: Gain a burst of speed when entering berserk mode.

optionalfeature.name: Blood Reaction
entries: A percentage of precision is given as a bonus to ferocity and a percentage of power is given as a bonus to condition damage. These bonuses are doubled in berserk mode.

optionalfeature.name: Heat the Soul
entries: Grant boons to nearby allies when you use a Burst skill.

optionalfeature.name: Dead or Alive
entries: Heal yourself and gain Blood Reckoning when entering berserk mode.

optionalfeature.name: Fatal Frenzy

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Blood Reaction|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Heat the Soul|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Dead or Alive|GW2HoT}

entries: Berserk mode increases power and condition damage.

optionalfeature.name: Bloody Roar
entries: Deal increased strike damage while in berserk mode. Gain resistance when entering berserk mode. Increase the duration of burning you apply. Gain fire aura when you critically hit an enemy. Berserker skills detonate fire aura, damaging and burning nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: King of Fires
entries: Increase the duration of burning you apply. Gain fire aura when you critically hit an enemy. Berserker skills detonate fire aura, damaging and burning nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Berserk
entries: {@b Properties:} Rage, Grants Adrenaline, Attack Speed, Primal Bursts
{@b Description:} Rage. Gain adrenaline, an attack-speed boost, and access to primal burst skills.

optionalfeature.name: Arc Divider
entries: {@b Description:} Spin to create a violent shock wave that damages nearby foes.

{@b Effect:} Each hostile creature in the emanation must make a Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 6d6} slashing damage, or half as much on a successful save.
{@b Scaling:} The damage increases by {@damage 2d6} when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 8d6}), 11 ({@damage 10d6}), and 17 ({@damage 12d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Rupturing Smash
entries: {@b Properties:} {@variantrule Combo Finisher|GW}: Blast, Primal Burst
{@b Description:} Jump to the targeted location and slam your hammer down, creating a deadly chain of earthen shock waves that immobilize and daze foes.

{@b Effect:} Choose a point you can see within range. Leap to that point and cause a Blast {@variantrule Combo Finisher|GW}. Each hostile creature in the area must make a Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 3d8} bludgeoning damage, is {@variantrule Immobilized|GW2} and {@variantrule Dazed|GW2} for 1 round. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@variantrule Immobilized|GW2} or {@variantrule Dazed|GW2}.
{@b Scaling:} The damage increases by {@damage 1d8} when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 4d8}), 11 ({@damage 5d8}), and 17 ({@damage 6d8}).

optionalfeature.name: Scorched Earth
entries: {@b Casting Time:} Action or Bonus Action
{@b Properties:} {@variantrule Combo Field|GW}: Fire, Primal Burst
{@b Description:} Fire a burning shot into the ground that creates a trail of flaming destruction.

{@b Effect:} For the duration, you create a 120-foot-long 10-foot-wide line originating from you in a direction you choose, that is a Fire {@variantrule Combo Field|GW}. Each hostile creature in that Line must make a Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 1d6} fire damage and is inflicted with 1 stack of Burning for 1 round, taking {@damage 1d12} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage only. A hostile creature also makes this save if it enters the Line or ends its turn there. A hostile creature makes this save only once per turn.

{@b Scaling:} The damage each increases by {@damage 1d6} and {@damage 1d12} respectively when you reach levels 5 ({@damage} 2d6 & {@damage 2d12}), 11 ({@damage 3d6} & {@damage 3d12}), and 17 ({@damage 4d6} & {@damage 4d12}).

optionalfeature.name: Gun Flame
entries: {@b Properties:} {@variantrule Combo Finisher|GW2}: Projectile, Primal Burst
{@b Description:} Fire a fast, flaming shot that explodes on impact near your foe, interrupting foes in the area.

{@b Effect:} Choose one creature you can see within range. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d10} fire damage and is inflicted with 1 stack of {@variantrule Burning|GW2} for 1 round, taking {@damage 1d12} damage. Additionally, each hostile creature within 5 feet of the target must succeed on a Constitution {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB} or be {@variantrule Dazed|GW2} for 1 round.

{@b Scaling:} The damage each increases by {@damage 1d10} and {@damage 1d12} respectively when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 3d10} & {@damage 2d12}), 11 ({@damage 4d10} & {@damage 3d12}), and 17 ({@damage 5d10} & {@damage 4d12}).

optionalfeature.name: Rampart Splitter
entries: {@b Properties:} Primal Burst, Knockdown, Immobilize, Heal, Grants Regeneration

{@b Description:} Primal Burst. Slam your staff on the ground, sending a shock wave forward that damages and immobilizes enemies while inspiring nearby allies, healing and granting regeneration to them.

optionalfeature.name: Wild Throw
entries: {@b Description:} Primal Burst. Throw several piercing spears that inflict vulnerability in quick succession.

optionalfeature.name: Decapitate
entries: {@b Description:} Gather your strength into a powerful attack. If it hits, gain might and recharge this skill.

{@b Effect:} Choose one creature you can see within range. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d10} slashing damage, you gain 5 stacks of {@variantrule Might|GW2} for 1 round and you recharge this skill.
{@b Scaling:} The damage increases by {@damage 2d10} when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 5d10}), 11 ({@damage 7d10}), and 17 ({@damage 9d10}).

optionalfeature.name: Slicing Maelstrom
entries: {@b Properties:} Primal Burst, Remove Boon, Grants Adrenaline
{@b Description:} Primal Burst. Slice nearby enemies, removing boons and gaining adrenaline per boon removed. Deal more damage if your target has no boons.

optionalfeature.name: Skull Grinder
entries: {@b Casting Time:} Action or Bonus Action
{@b Description:} Unleash a powerful skull strike that dazes your target and inflicts multiple conditions.

{@b Effect:} Choose one creature you can see within range. Leap within 5 feet of the target and make a melee weapon attack against it. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage, is inflicted with 1 round of {@variantrule Blindness|GW2}, {@variantrule Daze|GW2}, {@variantrule Crippled|GW2}, 4 stacks of {@variantrule Bleeding|GW2} for 1 round taking {@damage 1d8} damage and 4 stacks of {@variantrule Confusion|GW2} for 1 round, taking {@damage 1d6} damage.

{@b Scaling:} The impact damage increases by {@damage 1d8} when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 3d8}), 11 ({@damage 4d8}), and 17 ({@damage 5d8}). The stacks of {@variantrule Bleeding|GW2} and {@variantrule Confusion|GW2} inflicted increases by 1 when you reach levels 5 (5), 11 (6), and 17 (7).

optionalfeature.name: Flaming Flurry
entries: {@b Description:} Lash out with a flurry of strikes that block missiles and shoot fireballs at foes in front of you.

{@b Effect:} At the beginning of the Channel and then every 4 {@variantrule Initiative|GW2} thereafter, make a melee weapon attack against one creature within range. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d4} fire damage and is inflicted with 1 stack of {@variantrule Burning|GW2} for 1 round, taking {@damage 1d12} damage. While channeling, you gain a +5 bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

{@b Scaling:} The damage each increases by {@damage 1d4} and {@damage 1d12} respectively when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 2d4} & {@damage 2d12}), 11 ({@damage 3d4} & {@damage 3d12}), and 17 ({@damage 4d4} & {@damage 4d12}).

optionalfeature.name: Burning Shackles

prerequisite.other: Berserk wielding a Harpoon Gun underwater

entries: {@b Properties:} {@variantrule Combo Finisher|GW2}: Projectile, Primal Burst
{@b Description:} Fire a fast, forceful shot that immobilizes and burns foes.

{@b Effect:} Choose one creature you can see within range. When the {@variantrule Channel|Gw2} ends, make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 7d4} piercing damage and is inflicted with 1 round of {@variantrule Immobilize|GW2} and 1 stack of {@variantrule Burning|GW2} for 2 rounds, taking {@damage 1d12} damage.

{@b Scaling:} The damage each increases by {@damage 2d4} and {@damage 1d12} respectively when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 9d4} & {@damage 2d12}), 11 ({@damage 11d4} & {@damage 3d12}), and 17 ({@damage 13d4} & {@damage 4d12}).

optionalfeature.name: Wild Whirl
entries: {@b Properties:} {@variantrule Combo Finisher|GW2}: Whirl, Primal Burst
{@b Description:} Strike all foes around you, burning and pulling them in.

{@b Effect:} Choose up to 5 creatures within 40 feet of you. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 2d8} piercing, is inflicted with 2 stacks of {@variantrule Burning|GW2} for 1 round, taking {@damage 1d12} damage, and is {@variantrule Pull|GW2|Pulled} 30 feet toward you.

{@b Scaling:} The damage each increases by {@damage 1d8} and {@damage 1d12} respectively when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 3d8} & {@damage 2d12}), 11 ({@damage 4d8} & {@damage 3d12}), and 17 ({@damage 5d8} & {@damage 4d12}).

optionalfeature.name: Blood Reckoning
entries: {@b Description:} Heal yourself, gain adrenaline, and recharge all primal burst skills. Heal for a percentage of your outgoing damage. This skill extends the duration of berserk mode.

{@b Effect:} You regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d8} + your Class modifier, gain 10 Adrenaline, recharge your Primal Burst skills, extend the duration of berserk mode by 1 round, and heal for 33% of your outgoing damage for the duration.
{@b Scaling:} The healing increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach levels 5 ({@dice 2d8}), 11 ({@dice 3d8}), and 17 ({@dice 4d8}).

optionalfeature.name: Outrage
entries: {@b Properties:} Rage, Break Stun, Extends Berserk
{@b Description:} Rage. Break out of stun and extend the duration of berserk mode. The extension of berserk mode increases if an enemy is nearby.

optionalfeature.name: Shattering Blow
entries: {@b Properties:} Rage, Block, Inflicts Bleeding, Extends Berserk

{@b Description:} Rage. Summon a rock that blocks attacks, then shatter it to send out rock fragments that inflict bleeding on all foes in front of you. Extends the duration of berserk mode if it hits.

optionalfeature.name: Sundering Leap
entries: {@b Properties:} Rage, Leap, Damage, Inflicts Conditions, Extends Berserk
{@b Description:} Rage. Leap to a location, dealing damage and inflicting conditions on all foes in the area. Extends the duration of berserk mode if it hits.

optionalfeature.name: Wild Blow
entries: {@b Properties:} Rage, Knockdown, Grants Fury, Extends Berserk
{@b Description:} Rage. Lash out with a critical attack that knocks down your foes. Gain fury and extend the duration of berserk mode if this attack hits.

optionalfeature.name: Head Butt
entries: {@b Properties:} Rage, Stun, Grants Adrenaline, Extends Berserk
{@b Description:} Rage. Stun your target and stun yourself. Gain adrenaline and extend berserk duration if you hit.

optionalfeature.name: Eternal Champion
entries: Gain stability and endurance when entering berserk mode. Traits that trigger when entering berserk mode also trigger when exiting berserk mode. You can now exit berserk mode early.

optionalfeature.name: Blaze Breaker
entries: {@b Description:} Smash your torch into the ground, creating a deadly shock wave that conditions foes.

optionalfeature.name: Flames of War
entries: {@b Properties:} Cures Conditions, Fire Field, Inflicts Burn, Explosive, Damage
{@b Description:} Cleanse conditions and become a mobile fire field that burns nearby foes. When the field expires, it explodes, damaging foes and burning them again.

optionalfeature.name: Heat Sync
entries: {@b Properties:} Fire, Grants Might, Grants Fury, Spreads Boons
{@b Description:} Give might and fury to yourself, then spread boons you have to allies.

optionalfeature.name: Wildfire
entries: {@b Description:} Release a fiery torrent that burns enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Tidal Surge
entries: {@b Description:} Send out a tidal wave that regenerates and heals allies, then knocks enemies back.

optionalfeature.name: Water Globe
entries: {@b Description:} Blast out a watery orb that heals allies as it travels.

optionalfeature.name: Cyclone
entries: {@b Description:} Blast out a cyclone that pulls enemies toward its location and grants swiftness to allies it affects.

optionalfeature.name: Lightning Orb
entries: {@b Description:} Launch an orb of lightning that fires projectiles at nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Sand Squall
entries: {@b Properties:} Earth, Grants Protection, Extends Boon Duration, Magnetic Aura
{@b Description:} Apply protection to you and your allies, then increase the duration of all boons currently existing on you and your allies. Gain magnetic aura.

optionalfeature.name: Dust Storm
entries: {@b Properties:} Earth, Grants Boons, Inflicts Conditions
{@b Description:} Grant boons to nearby allies and summon a dust storm that inflicts conditions.

optionalfeature.name: Positive Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Smack your hammer into your foe while empowering yourself.

optionalfeature.name: Negative Bash

prerequisite.other: Requires Hammer. Must follow Positive Strike.

entries: {@b Description:} Slam your hammer into your foe to leave them vulnerable.

optionalfeature.name: Equalizing Blow

prerequisite.other: Requires Hammer. Must follow Negative Bash.

entries: {@b Description:} Bring down your hammer on your foe.

optionalfeature.name: Electro-whirl
entries: {@b Description:} Spin around, reflecting missiles and hitting enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Rocket Charge
entries: {@b Description:} Dash forward with a rocket-charged hammer to damage enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Shock Shield
entries: {@b Description:} Block attacks while striking foes in front of you, gaining barrier with each enemy you hit.

optionalfeature.name: Thunderclap
entries: {@b Description:} Ionize an area, bringing down the power of lightning to stun foes and damage them over its duration.

optionalfeature.name: "Wash the Pain Away!"
entries: {@b Description:} Shouts. Mists billow from you, healing allies in range and cleansing conditions.

optionalfeature.name: "Feel the Burn!"
entries: {@b Properties:} Shout, Damage, Grants Fire Aura
{@b Description:} Shout. Heat waves blast out from the player, causing damage and granting fire aura to allies.

optionalfeature.name: "Eye of the Storm!"
entries: {@b Properties:} Shout, Grants Superspeed, Breaks Stun
{@b Description:} Shout. Imbue your voice with the element of air, massively increasing speed and breaking stun for nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: "Aftershock!"
entries: {@b Properties:} Shout, Inflicts Cripple, Immobilize, Grants Magnetic Aura
{@b Description:} Shout. Call upon the earth to cripple and immobilize foes in the area around you. Allies in the initial blast gain a magnetic aura.

optionalfeature.name: "Flash-Freeze!"
entries: {@b Properties:} Shout, Inflicts Chill, Grants Frost Aura
{@b Description:} Shout. Unleash a torrent of ice on enemy locations, chilling those who cannot escape. Grant frost aura to allies in range.

optionalfeature.name: "Rebound!"
entries: {@b Description:} Shout and infuse your allies with arcane energy. Allies who would take lethal damage while this is active ignore the deathblow and are healed instead. If the effect expires naturally, grant an aura based on your current attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Medic Gyro
entries: {@b Description:} Deploy a medic gyro to heal yourself and nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Reconstruction Field

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Medic Gyro

entries: {@b Description:} Establish a defensive field, granting protection to allies in its area.

optionalfeature.name: Blast Gyro
entries: {@b Description:} Unleash a blast gyro to begin a countdown to a tremendous blast.

optionalfeature.name: Bypass Coating

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Blast Gyro

entries: {@b Description:} Splash a hypercoating on nearby allies, granting superspeed.

optionalfeature.name: Bulwark Gyro
entries: {@b Description:} Deploy a bulwark gyro to grant barrier to allies in the area.

optionalfeature.name: Defense Field

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Bulwark Gyro

entries: {@b Description:} Project a defensive dome around yourself and grant stability to nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Purge Gyro
entries: {@b Description:} Deploy a purge gyro to remove conditions from you and your nearby allies.

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Purge Gyro

optionalfeature.name: Shredder Gyro
entries: {@b Description:} Deploy a shredder gyro to attack foes near you and repeatedly use whirl finishers.

optionalfeature.name: Spare Capacitor

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Shredder Gyro

entries: {@b Description:} Set down a lightning capacitor to daze and damage foes near it.

optionalfeature.name: Sneak Gyro
entries: {@b Description:} Deploy a sneak gyro to provide stealth to nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Overload Fire
entries: {@b Properties:} Overload, Grants Might, Inflicts Burn

{@b Description:} Overload. Unleash your flames, granting might to allies and burning enemies. Finishing the cast creates a tornado that continues to grant might and burn foes. Using this skill causes the attunement to have a longer recharge.

optionalfeature.name: Overload Water
entries: {@b Properties:} Overload, Heal, Cures Conditions, Grants Regeneration

{@b Description:} Overload. Create a surge of accumulated water magic, healing and cleansing allies. When the cast ends, heal the area and apply regeneration. Using this skill causes the attunement to have a longer recharge.

optionalfeature.name: Overload Air
entries: {@b Properties:} Overload, Grants Electricity Aura, Inflicts Stun

{@b Description:} Overload. Use your air magic to summon a nimbus that repeatedly strikes nearby enemies. When this ability is complete, imbue your allies with electricity and create a lingering static region that strikes enemies at the same interval. Using this skill causes the attunement to have a longer recharge.

optionalfeature.name: Overload Earth
entries: {@b Properties:} Overload, Grants Protection, Inflicts Cripple

{@b Description:} Overload. Ride your stored earth magic around, granting protection to other allies you move over and crippling enemies, then deliver a final immobilizing blast of power to the area, leaving behind a dust cyclone that delivers the same effects as the overload. Using this skill causes the attunement to have a longer recharge.

optionalfeature.name: Singularity

prerequisite.other: Access to the Tempest Elite Specialization.

entries: Attain elemental singularity by remaining in an attunement for a period of time. Upon attaining singularity, you may overload the attunement to your vicinity. Gain access to Shouts.

optionalfeature.name: Gale Song
entries: Grant protection to nearby allies when you use a healing skill.

optionalfeature.name: Latent Stamina
entries: Grant vigor to nearby allies when attuning to water. Restore endurance to allies you grant vigor.

optionalfeature.name: Unstable Conduit
entries: Overloads grant an aura based on your attunement.

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Gale Song|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Latent Stamina|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Unstable Conduit|GW2HoT}

optionalfeature.name: Tempestuous Aria
entries: Using a shout grants allies might. Granting an aura to an ally increases your outgoing damage for a period of time.

optionalfeature.name: Harmonious Conduit
entries: Gain stability and swiftness when starting an overload.

optionalfeature.name: Invigorating Torrents
entries: Auras you grant also grant regeneration and vigor.

optionalfeature.name: Hardy Conduit

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Tempestuous Aria|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Harmonious Conduit|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Invigorating Torrents|GW2HoT}

entries: Overloads grant protection to nearby allies. Protection gains increased damage reduction.

optionalfeature.name: Transcendent Tempest
entries: Time to attain singularity is reduced. Upon successfully completing an overload, gain increased damage.

optionalfeature.name: Lucid Singularity
entries: Apply boons to nearby allies while channeling and when successfully completing a channel.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Bastion
entries: Heal allies you grant an aura to. Grant frost aura to nearby allies when struck while below the health threshold.

optionalfeature.name: Function Gyro

prerequisite.other: Access to the Scrapper Elite Specialization.

entries: You gain access to the function gyro, which replaces your tool belt skill 5. Gain access to Gyro skills.

optionalfeature.name: Gyroscopic Acceleration
entries: Well abilities have an increased area of effect and grant superspeed to nearby allies on their first pulse. Your function gyro also grants superspeed to allies when cast.

optionalfeature.name: System Shocker
entries: Disabling a foe grants barrier to nearby allies. Your function gyro dazes foes when cast. Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

optionalfeature.name: Mass Momentum
entries: Gain might while you have stability. Your Function Gyro applies stability to allies when cast.

optionalfeature.name: Speed of Synergy

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Gyroscopic Acceleration|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature System Shocker|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Mass Momentum|GW2HoT}

entries: Using a heal skill grants superspeed in a radius around you. Using a healing skill's associated tool-belt skill grants you personal superspeed.

optionalfeature.name: Rapid Regeneration
entries: Regenerate health while affected by swiftness or superspeed.

optionalfeature.name: Expert Examination
entries: Your function gyro grants protection to allies when cast. Using a healing skill's associated toolbelt grants protection to nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Object in Motion
entries: Deal increased strike damage while you have stability, swiftness, or superspeed. This damage increase compounds for each boon you have.

optionalfeature.name: Impact Savant

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Rapid Regeneration|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Expert Examination|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Object in Motion|GW2HoT}

entries: A percentage of the strike damage you deal is converted into barrier.

optionalfeature.name: Ex Machina
entries: Function gyro has additional charges, no longer has a recharge penalty, and grants barrier to nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Kinetic Accelerators
entries: Grant boons to nearby allies when you successfully combo a field with a blast, leap, or whirl finisher. Your function gyro is now a blast finisher. Whirl finishers can only trigger this trait once per interval.

optionalfeature.name: Applied Force
entries: Gain stability when you gain might at or above the threshold. Might grants bonus power.

subclassFeature.name: Berserker
entries: You have adopted the Berserker Elite Specialization. You gain proficiency with {@item Torch|XPHB|Torches} and can use their {@variantrule Weapon Skill|GW2|Weapon Skills}.

You now qualify to learn Berserker specific {@variantrule Healing Skill|GW2|Healing Skills}, {@variantrule Utility Skill|GW2|Utility Skills}, and {@variantrule Elite Skill|GW2|Elite Skills} when you choose your skills.

You have learned to channel the Adrenaline of battle to fuel powerful attacks called Bursts. When you deal damage to a creature you gain one strike of Adrenaline to a maximum of ten strikes. Adrenaline lasts until it is expended, you roll initiative or exit combat, or 10 minutes have passed.

Once you have accumulated ten strikes of Adrenaline, you can use the Burst {@variantrule Skill|GW2} associated with your equipped main-hand weapon as shown in the {@table Warrior Burst Skills|GW2} table by expending all strikes.

Alternatively, you can choose to expend all your Adrenaline to enter a Berserk state (no {@variantrule Action|GW2} required) for a number of rounds equal to a tenth of the amount of Adrenaline you spent. While in this state, you under the following effects:
• When you enter it you gain ten strikes of Adrenaline.
• You gain an additional {@variantrule Action|XPHB} on each of your turns. The additional action can only be used to activate a {@variantrule Skill|GW2}.
Once you exit the Berserk state, it must recharge ({@chance 55|10+}) before you can enter it again.

subclassFeature.name: Elite Specialization
entries: You gain access to the {@table Warrior Traits|GW2|Berserker} Specialization and learn its Minor Adept {@variantrule traits|GW2|trait} {@optfeature Primal Rage|GW2HoT}.

subclassFeature.name: Primal Adrenaline
entries: Your primal connection to fire allows you to harness your Adrenaline in new ways. Your maximum Adrenaline outside of Berserk state increases by 10, to a total of 20.
Additionally, when you roll {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} you gain five strikes of Adrenaline.
Lastly, while in your Berserk state, when you deal non-fire damage to a creature, you can choose to convert that damage to fire damage.

subclassFeature.name: Champion of Fire
entries: Your connection to the primal fire has given you access to a deep connection with flame. You gain resistance to fire damage and you learn the {@spell Control Flames|XGE}, {@spell Produce Flame|XPHB} and {@spell Continual Flame|XPHB} {@variantrule Spell|XPHB|Spells}. You can cast them at will without material components.

subclassFeature.name: No Pain No Gain
entries: You have gained the ability to convert your pain into power. When you take damage from a hostile creature, you gain one strike of Adrenaline.
Additionally, when you roll {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} you gain an additional five strikes of Adrenaline, for a total of ten.
Lastly, while in your Berserk state, fire damage you deal ignores resistance.

subclassFeature.name: Champion of the Arena
entries: You have learned to use your combat prowess to get what you want. You gain expertise in the {@skill Intimidation} skill.
Additionally, you can add your Constitution modifier to your Strength and Charisma {@variantrule Ability Check|XPHB|Ability Checks}.

subclassFeature.name: Adrenaline Pinnacle
entries: You have reached the pinnacle of your Adrenaline mastery. Your maximum Adrenaline outside of Berserk state increases by 10, to a total of 30.
Additionally, when you roll {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} you gain an additional five strikes of Adrenaline, for a total of 15.
Lastly, while in your Berserk state, fire damage you deal ignores resistance and treats immunity as resistance.

subclassFeature.name: Champion of Primordial Fire
entries: You have become one with the primordial fire. You gain immunity to fire damage.
Additionally, you gain {@sense Blindsight} out to 30 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Eternal Rage
entries: You have mastered the art of berserking. You gain the following benefits:
• When you roll {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB}, you gain an additional 15 strikes of Adrenaline, for a total of 30.
• While in your Berserk state, when you start your turn with less than 10 strikes of Adrenaline, you gain 5 strikes of Adrenaline.
• When you are reduced to 0 hit points while in your Berserk state, you can choose to drop to 1 hit point instead and end your Berserk state.
• While in your Berserk state, fire damage you deal ignores resistance and immunity.
